name: Ring State VR
description:
Flow State VR - Requires Steam VR

Flow State VR is a game where the player needs to dodge, reload shoot there way to victory.

- 4 Environments to lose yourself.

- 3 Difficulties with a layered progression system.

- Upgrade system for the player to get more powerful.

- Achievements

Flow State VR is a student project developed over 4 weeks.
